about_the_game:
"ENDLESS CIRCULATION" is the DLC for EZ2ON REBOOT : R.
This DLC includes the following content:

Songs

▣ 1. A Site De La Rue | by STREME REVERIE
▣ 2. A Glimmer | by Rammage
▣ 3. actias artemis | by iMp
▣ 4. Airwave | by Kari
▣ 5. BEATRICE | by RMHN

▣ 10. Entire | by KIEN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-530 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 620 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

kgrb.descriptors:
제명 : EZ2ON REBOOT : R (이지투온 리부트 R)
등급분류결정 : 12세이용가

short_description: Experience the third arcade-style DLC of EZ2ON REBOOT : R, themed around ENDLESS CIRCULATION. Discover the answers you seek with a total of 39 new songs.
